title: ThatOneChance
author: ThatOneChance
content: The only time you get that ONE chancehttps://bitify.com/auctions/self-help/your-guide-to-legal-and-easy-bitcoin-income-5467012/

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: Op I checked the website and it looks like and exchange. Even though you dropped a link for users to check the site, you would have explained what service you rendering so that people in the forum will be well inform the kind of service you provide. But this one you just say "One Chance". If I may ask, one chance for what? Explain more about your service for people to understand. Thanks

comments.author: Freedom4All
comments.body: So I pay $19 and thatÂ´s my one chance in my life? Yeah right

comments.author: Broadanbig
comments.body: Indeed a one chance agenda . I was still thinking what kind of a one chance arrangement is this after going through the web page. I saw somethings for which one needs to pay for, there is no much explanations about the page and I really do not understand what's up with this web page. OP did not do formal introduction about the website but rather possibly putting just affiliate link here for us to get registered which is not appropriate here.OP I would advise you properly make a thread to properly introduce your product as this you have done does not give anything tangible about your project.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.created_time: July 02, 2023, 10:57:55 PMLast edit: July 03, 2023, 11:50:48 AM by robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: ThatOneChance on July 02, 2023, 05:06:52 PMThe only time you get that ONE chancehttps://bitify.com/auctions/self-help/your-guide-to-legal-and-easy-bitcoin-income-5467012/Really? What a shill, it better live up to what its promises QuoteLet go your problems. Set yourself free. If you did not make enough money next week, I will refund you.Only 5 items when it's an e-book and the item will expire on 7/3/2023, 11:30:16 PM, marketers use this trick to create a FOMO.If you're the author of this e-book and this is the kind of marketing you can come up with I'll have second thoughts, about buying this, it lacks information at least a peek at what's on it, maybe because what's on it is old methods and just it gave it new twists.
